titles.title: Child Tax Credit Extension Act
Child Tax Credit Extension Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent certain changes made by Public Law 115-97 to the child tax credit.
Child Tax Credit Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Child Tax Credit Extension Act
This bill makes permanent changes to the child tax credit enacted by the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (P.L. 115-97), including increasing the amount of such credit from $1,000 to $2,000.
